title: Vestal ZR-2 Watch
description:
[ VESTAL ZR-2 WATCH ]
Inspired by its sibling, the ZR-2 is everything the ZR-3 has to offer while captured in a smaller 43mm case. The ZR-2 is a mid-sized premium round chronograph. Its stainless steel case construction includes an extra thick raised crystal seated in an angular fixed bezel and screw-down logo plate. These features together with a crown guard and protective pusher design add to its sophisticated yet retro styling. The ZR-2 is finished with a vintage inspired three-link bracelet and a premium butterfly deployant clasp.

SPECIFICATIONS:
CASE: 43MM WIDE STAINLESS STEEL. 316L SURGICAL GRADE
BAND: 19.5MM WIDE STAINLESS STEEL. 316L SURGICAL GRADE
BUCKLE: STAINLESS STEEL BUTTERFLY DEPLOYANT
CRYSTAL: SOLID MINERAL
MOVEMENT: 6-HAND PREMIUM CHRONOGRAPH. MADE IN JAPAN
WATER RESISTANCE: 10 ATM / 100 METERS
WRIST: MEDIUM
